English: Ah, it's you.
It's been a long time since we've last seen each other.
Spanish: Ha pasado mucho tiempo desde la última vez que nos vimos.

English: During this time... you've been teetering on the edge of a cliff.
Spanish: Durante este tiempo... has estado tambaleándote en el borde de un acantilado

English: You may have forgotten who you are, but just remembering your name is enough.
Spanish: Puede que hayas olvidado quién eres, pero basta con recordar tu nombre.

English: ...It's time. Don't linger here for too long.
Spanish: ...Es el momento. No te quedes aquí mucho tiempo

English: After all, you aren't my guest yet, nor should you even be here.
Spanish: Después de todo, aún no eres mi invitado, y ni siquiera deberías estar aquí.

English: She still needs you.
December 23rd.
You may not remember what this date means to you.
Spanish: Puede que no recuerdes lo que esta fecha significa para ti.

English: And this will thrust you into peril.
Spanish: Y esto te pondrá en peligro.

English: No...
You must try to remember.
...consciousness...
Circulation resumed... vitals stabilized... cardioplegia solution injected…
Spanish: La circulación se reanudó... los signos vitales se estabilizaron... se inyectó solución para la cardioplejía...

English: Body temperature low... administering Hexamethasone 20 c.c., now...
Spanish: Temperatura corporal baja... administrando 20 c.c de Hexametasona, ahora...

English: Get the hemostat!
...Conditions stable... beginning resection... be careful of VFib...
Spanish: ...Condiciones estables... comenzando la resección... ten cuidado con la fibrilación ventricular...

English: ...Sorry...
For making you suffer again...
Doctor...
...hand!
Take my...
Take my hand!!
Emergency...
...Help...
...It's done...!
Doctor, Doctor!
Medic, how's Doctor doing?
But, just a moment ago... we were holding hands...
Spanish: Pero, hace un momento... estábamos tomados de la mano...

English: So why... why is Doctor still not waking up...?
Spanish: Entonces, ¿por qué... por qué el Doctor todavía no se despierta...?

English: Amiya! Don't panic, just calm down first!
Ah... S-sorry.
You always get so flustered when it comes to the doctor.
Spanish: Siempre te pones tan nerviosa cuando se trata del Doctor.

English: But, Amiya, if the worst came to pass... what would you do then?
Spanish: Pero, Amiya, si sucediera lo peor... ¿Qué harías entonces?

English: ...I'm already mentally prepared for that. We would continue to follow the plan.
Spanish: Ya estoy mentalmente preparada para eso. Continuaríamos el plan.

English: ...I understand. Anyway, I'll do what you requested.
Spanish: Entiendo. De todos modos, haré lo que me pidas.

English: All right... I appreciate it.
About the Doctor...
Don't worry, Amiya. All the vital signs are stable now.
Spanish: No te preocupes, Amiya. Todos los signos vitales están estables ahora.

English: I'll do one more inspection, just for you.
Spanish: Haré una inspección más, solo por ti.

English: Thank you... Thank you very much!
Mhm. Breathing is slightly shallow, but blood pressure is normal. There should be no cause for concern.
Spanish: Hmm… La respiración es un poco artificial, pero la presión arterial es normal. No debe haber motivo de preocupación.

English: Are you awake?
Amiya, it's a success! The Doctor has woken up!
Spanish: Amiya, ¡Es un éxito! ¡El Doctor se ha despertado!

English: Doctor...?
I'm so happy... Doctor...
Ah, careful! You mustn't do that...
Don't try to move yet. Your body still hasn't fully adapted to this.
Spanish: No intentes moverte todavía. Tu cuerpo aún no se ha adaptado completamente esto.

English: Doctor...?
Who... are you?
Ah, Doctor... It's me...
It's me, Amiya.
We've come to rescue you.
You...
You're a member of Rhodes Island, just like us...
Spanish: Eres miembro de Rhodes Island, como nosotros…

English: ...as well as my partner.
...Dr. {nombre}.
You're the most important person to me.
Spanish: Eres la persona más importante para mí.

English: Doctor... you don't remember?
...Can I trust you?
I understand. I know this is a bit much to take in right now.
Spanish: Entiendo. Sé que esto es demasiado para asimilar ahora.

English: I don't expect you to remember everything right away, and I'm not asking you to trust me right now.
Spanish: No espero que recuerdes todo de inmediato y no te estoy pidiendo que confíes en mí en este momento.

English: Dr. {nombre}, do you really not remember me at all...?
Spanish: Doctor. {nombre}, ¿de verdad no se acuerda nada de mí...?

English: Even if that's the case... I won't give up.
Spanish: Incluso si ese es el caso... no me rendiré.

English: We've already sacrificed so much, just to find you...
Spanish: Ya hemos sacrificado tanto, sólo para encontrarte...

English: I see... Pleased to meet you, Amiya.
Spanish: Ya veo… encantado de conocerte, Amiya.

English: Ah, um, hello.
I, I don't know how to put this, but so many things have changed from before.
Spanish: Yo... no sé cómo decir esto, pero muchas cosas han cambiado.

English: That includes me as well.
Spanish: Eso me incluye a mí también.

English: However, you'll always be the most important person to me, Doctor. No matter what happens, this will never change.
Spanish: Sin embargo, siempre será la persona más importante para mí, Doctor. Pase lo que pase, eso nunca cambiará.

English: So that's why, please... give me a little more time.
Spanish: Por eso, por favor… deme un poco más de tiempo.

English: However little it might be...
Does the doctor... really have amnesia?
I'm sure everything will be fine if we give Doctor some space...
Spanish: Estoy segura de que todo irá bien si le damos algo de espacio al Doctor...

English: Where is this...
It's safe here—
Huh? What's happening—
Amiya, we've got a problem!
Someone broke into the facility!
The way they're dressed... they don't look like Ursus soldiers!
Spanish: La forma en la que están vestidos… ¡No se parecen a los soldados de Ursus!

English: What's the meaning of this?!
They're attacking! Amiya, they're heavily equipped with weapons!
Spanish: ¡Están atacando! ¡Amiya, están fuertemente equipados con armas!

English: Aaaahh!
Be careful, everyone! Take cover, and protect Doctor!
Spanish: ¡Todos, tengan cuidado! ¡Cúbranse y protejan al Doctor!

English: These outfits... are they from the Reunion Movement? But how is that possible...
Spanish: Estos atuendos… ¿son del Movimiento Reunión? Pero, ¿cómo es posible…?

English: Guards, prepare for battle!
Roger!
Curses... Are they after the Doctor?!
No... Nobody else should know about the Doctor being here.
Spanish: No... Nadie más debería saber que el Doctor está aquí.

English: Are you able to reach Kal'tsit?
I'm not sure why, but the equipment isn't working!
Spanish: ¡No sé porque, pero el equipo no funciona!

English: ...Someone has cut off our communications.
Have we been discovered by the Ursus government?
Spanish: ¿Nos ha descubierto el gobierno de Ursus?

English: What do we do now?
Kal'tsit won't be able to command the battle as we had originally planned.
Spanish: Kal'tsit no podrá dirigir la batalla como habíamos planeado originalmente.

English: ...Dr. {nombre}.
I hope that... you'll be able to take command.
Spanish: Espero que… puedas tomar el mando.

English: Isn't that a bit too risky? The Doctor only just came to...
Spanish: ¿No es demasiado arriesgado? El Doctor acaba de despertar…

English: I'd like... to give it a try.
Even without memories, Doctor has...
Spanish: Si incluso sin recuerdos, el Doctor ha…

English: ...fought alongside us before.
Thank you for all of your guidance...
We've been through so much together...
Spanish: Hemos pasado por muchas cosas juntos…

English: Doctor... I just know that you'll be able to do it.
Spanish: Doctor… solo sé que podrás hacerlo.

English: I know that you'll lead us to victory.
Spanish: Sé que nos conducirás a la victoria.

English: I understand that asking you to do this is very sudden and inconsiderate.
Spanish: Entiendo que pedirle que haga esto es muy repentino y desconsiderado.

English: But... Please, lend us your aid.
We'll be supporting you!
Let's push them back first!
We have no choice but to fight back, right?
Spanish: No tenemos más opción que luchar, ¿verdad?

English: Mm... I don't want to drag you into this.
Spanish: Mm… No quisiera arrastrarte a esto.

English: But right now, we need your wisdom more than ever, Dr. {nombre}.
Spanish: Pero ahora mismo, necesitamos su sabiduría más que nunca, Doctor {nombre}.

English: I hope that a part of you will reawaken during combat.
Spanish: Espero que una parte de ti se despierte durante el combate.

English: Even though you might have doubts about yourself...
Spanish: Aunque tengas dudas sobre ti mismo…

English: But I believe in you.
I know you can do this.
Spanish: Yo sé que puedes hacer esto.

English: Please take command... of Rhodes Island!
Spanish: ¡Por favor, toma el mando… de Rhodes Island!
